name: SE2-07 — SAUZIER'S WHISPER
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Sauzier Waterfall (Port Glaud / near Port Launay, Mahé). Where the westward fall sings, follow the echo.
Its measure climbs the coast to a hidden path.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare
Sauzier Waterfall (Port Glaud / near Port Launay, Mahé)

properties.cipher: echo 'bars' mark an angle; chest handle points seaward.
properties.clue:
Where the westward fall sings, follow the echo.
Its measure climbs the coast to a hidden path.
properties.visual_description: Lush fall; rope-ladder fragment; echo lines like music staff; chest handle half-buried; a parrot on branch.
